problem_names:
theorem 
  fixes \<Gamma> :: "'a :: countable formula set"
  shows "\<Gamma> \<TTurnstile> F \<Longrightarrow> \<Gamma> \<turnstile> F"
translations:
theorem 
  fixes \<Gamma> :: "'a :: countable formula set"
  shows "\<Gamma> \<TTurnstile> F \<Longrightarrow> \<Gamma> \<turnstile> F"

proof (state)
this:
  \<Gamma> \<TTurnstile> F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Gamma> \<TTurnstile> F \<Longrightarrow> \<Gamma> \<turnstile> F

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?\<Gamma> \<TTurnstile> ?F;
   \<And>\<Gamma>'.
      \<lbrakk>set \<Gamma>' \<subseteq> ?\<Gamma>;
       \<Turnstile> \<^bold>\<And>\<Gamma>' \<^bold>\<rightarrow>
                    ?F\<rbrakk>
      \<Longrightarrow> ?thesis\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?thesis
  \<Gamma> \<TTurnstile> F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. thesis

proof (state)
this:
  set G \<subseteq> \<Gamma>
  \<Turnstile> \<^bold>\<And>G \<^bold>\<rightarrow> F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Gamma> \<TTurnstile> F \<Longrightarrow> \<Gamma> \<turnstile> F

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<Turnstile> ?F \<Longrightarrow> {} \<turnstile> ?F
  \<Turnstile> \<^bold>\<And>G \<^bold>\<rightarrow> F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. {} \<turnstile> \<^bold>\<And>G \<^bold>\<rightarrow> F

proof (state)
this:
  {} \<turnstile> \<^bold>\<And>G \<^bold>\<rightarrow> F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Gamma> \<TTurnstile> F \<Longrightarrow> \<Gamma> \<turnstile> F

proof (prove)
using this:
  (set ?G \<turnstile> ?F) =
  ({} \<turnstile> \<^bold>\<And>?G \<^bold>\<rightarrow> ?F)
  {} \<turnstile> \<^bold>\<And>G \<^bold>\<rightarrow> F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. set G \<turnstile> F

proof (state)
this:
  set G \<turnstile> F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Gamma> \<TTurnstile> F \<Longrightarrow> \<Gamma> \<turnstile> F

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<lbrakk>?\<Gamma> \<turnstile> ?F;
   ?\<Gamma> \<subseteq> ?\<Gamma>'\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?\<Gamma>' \<turnstile> ?F
  set G \<turnstile> F

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?\<Gamma> \<turnstile> ?F;
   ?\<Gamma> \<subseteq> ?\<Gamma>'\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?\<Gamma>' \<turnstile> ?F
  set G \<turnstile> F

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Gamma> \<turnstile> F

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?\<Gamma> \<turnstile> ?F;
   ?\<Gamma> \<subseteq> ?\<Gamma>'\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> ?\<Gamma>' \<turnstile> ?F
  set G \<turnstile> F
  set G \<subseteq> \<Gamma>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<Gamma> \<turnstile> F

proof (state)
this:
  \<Gamma> \<turnstile> F

goal:
No subgoals!
